      • loadImageFromClassPath

        protected science.aist.imaging.service.opencv.imageprocessing.wrapper.OpenCVImageWrapper loadImageFromClassPath​(String imagePath)
        Loads an image (colored!) from the classPath.
        Parameters:
        imagePath - relative path to the image. (e.g. /logo.jpg for logo.jpg file in test/resources folder)
        Returns:
        the loaded imageWrapper

      • loadImageFromClassPath

        protected science.aist.imaging.service.opencv.imageprocessing.wrapper.OpenCVImageWrapper loadImageFromClassPath​(String imagePath,
                                                                                                                boolean colored)
        Loads and image from the classPath.
        Parameters:
        imagePath - relative path to the image. (e.g. /logo.jpg for logo.jpg file in test/resources folder)
        colored - Flag if image should be loaded colored or in greyscale
        Returns:
        an ImageWrapper containing the loaded image or an empty wrapper if image could not be loaded

      • getPathToTempSubfolder

        protected String getPathToTempSubfolder​(String subfolder)
        Method which returns the absolute path to a given subfolder in the tempfolder Creates all needed subfolders
        Parameters:
        subfolder - Name of the subfolder(s) in the temp folder
        Returns:
        The path to the subfolder in the the temp folder

      • getPathToTempSubfolder

        protected String getPathToTempSubfolder​(String subfolder,
                                        boolean createSubfolders)
        Method which returns the absolute path to a given subfolder in the tempfolder Creates the needed subfolders if flag is set
        Parameters:
        subfolder - Name of the subfolder(s) in the temp folder
        createSubfolders - Flag which signals if subfolders should be created if they are not existing
        Returns:
        The path to the subfolder in the the temp folder
